{"id":941407661,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"7 months, 1 week","timestamp":1682748045,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/941407661/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"String to Integer (atoi)","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    public int myAtoi(String s) {\n        s = s.trim();\n        char ch = s.charAt(0);\n        boolean check = false;\n        if(ch == '-') \n            check = true;\n        else if((int)(ch) < 48 || (int)(ch) > 57)\n            return 0;\n        return helper(s, \"0\", s.length(), check);\n    }\n\n    int helper(String s, String ans, int l, boolean check) {\n        if(s.isEmpty()) {\n            if(check) {\n                if(ans.length() > 9) {\n                    return Integer.MIN_VALUE;\n                } else {\n                    return -(Integer.parseInt(ans));\n                }\n            }\n            \n            if(ans.length() > 9) {\n                    return Integer.MAX_VALUE;\n                } else {\n                    return (Integer.parseInt(ans));\n                }\n        }\n\n        char ch = s.charAt(0);\n        if((int)(ch - '0') >= 0 && (int)(ch - '0') <= 9) {\n            int temp = (int)(ans.charAt(ans.length()-1) - '0') * 10 + ((int)(ch - '0'));\n            return helper(s.substring(1), ans.substring(0, ans.length()-1) + (String.valueOf(temp)) , l, check);\n        }\n\n        return helper(s.substring(1), ans, l, check);\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"string-to-integer-atoi","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
